# NSTouch.TouchType.direct

**Case**

A direct touch from a user’s finger on a screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case direct
```

## Touch Types

- **NSTouch.TouchType.indirect**: An indirect touch that is not on a screen, like a digitizer touch.

items.description: An indirect touch that is not on a screen, like a digitizer touch.
items.name: NSTouch.TouchType.indirect
